name: Hound Spawn

skills.name: Fire Breath
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +5%

skills.name: Adamantine Teeth
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Shattering Strike
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Will Ignore DEF and [Block Damage] buffs if the target has a [Freeze] debuff.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
